ComicInfo.Summary:
Wounded from his last battle with his son Durant, Gilad finds himself in the hospital with only one arm. With Durant still on the loose he decides he must finish him off before it is too late. Can he complete this righteous kill so that others may live?
1995 books with a UPC code may exist as "Newsstand Sales" in addition to "Direct Sales".
